price: 191 Associent-ils au culte d’Allah de faux dieux incapables de créer, étant eux-mêmes créés,
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
